about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Get to know our student council
about.heroDescription: The PGTK Student Council is an organization by students for students. We are the voice of every student and work to improve school life.
about.missionText1: The Student Council works to create a dynamic and inclusive environment where every student can develop their potential, be heard, and contribute to school life.
about.missionText2: We are the voice of the students and partners with the administration in creating a positive school community. We organize events, support initiatives, and make the school a place where everyone wants to be.
about.quote: Together we can achieve more than individually. The Student Council is proof of this.
about.visionText: To be a leading force for positive change in the school and community.
about.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide us in everything we do

heart.title: Heart and Spirit
heart.description: We believe in the power of community and collective spirit. Every student matters.

target.title: Goal and Focus
target.description: We set clear goals and work hard to achieve them.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We work together as one team for the common good of all students.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for the highest standards and recognize outstanding achievements.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We seek new and creative approaches to problem solving.

development.title: Development
development.description: We support the personal and professional development of every member.
